name: GRAVEN IMAGES
description:
Locked in a secluded house with an ominous altar and sinister statues.

Find a way out. Do it now.

Before they find you.

CONTROLS:

Move:  WASD

Look:  Mouse

Use:   Left Mouse/Right Mouse/E/F

NOTES:

A very short PSX horror lite game. Mostly made to learn UE4.

Hint: You can pick up statues and read books by pressing one of the use keys.
